Package com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractALSServlet
    Superclass of all servlets used in the ALS recommender API.
    AllItemIDsServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /item/allIDs and in turn calls OryxRecommender.getAllItemIDs().
    AllUserIDsServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /user/allIDs and in turn calls OryxRecommender.getAllUserIDs().
    ALSServingInitListener
    This servlet lifecycle listener makes sure that the shared OryxRecommender instance is initialized at startup, along with related objects, and shut down when the container is destroyed.
    BecauseServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /because/[userID]/[itemID](?howMany=n)(&offset=o), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendedBecause(String, String, int).
    EstimateForAnonymousServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /estimateForAnonymous/[toItemID]/[itemID1(=value1)](/[itemID2(=value2)]/...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.estimateForAnonymous(String, String[], float[]) with the supplied values.
    EstimateServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /estimate/[userID]/[itemID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String).
    IngestServlet
    Responds to a POST request to /ingest and in turn calls OryxRecommender.ingest(Reader)}.
    KnownItemsServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /knownItems/[userID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.getKnownItemsForUser(String).
    MostActiveUsersServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /mostActiveUsers(?howMany=n)(&offset=o) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.getMostActiveUsers(int).
    MostPopularItemsServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /mostPopularItems(?howMany=n)(&offset=o) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.mostPopularItems(int).
    MostSurprisingServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /mostSurprising/[userID](?howMany=n) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.mostSurprising(String, int).
    PopularRepresentativeItemsServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /popularRepresentativeItems and in turn calls OryxRecommender.popularRepresentativeItems().
    PreferenceServlet
    Responds to a POST request to /pref/[userID]/[itemID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.setPreference(String, String, float).
    ReadyServlet
    Responds to a HEAD or GET request to /ready and in turn calls OryxRecommender.isReady().
    RecommendServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /recommend/[userID](?howMany=n)(&offset=o)(&considerKnownItems=true|false)(&rescorerParams=...) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommend(String, int).
    RecommendToAnonymousServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /recommendToAnonymous/[itemID1(=value1)](/[itemID2(=value2)]/...)(?howMany=n)(&offset=o)(&rescorerParams=...) , and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int, Rescorer) with the supplied values.
    RecommendToManyServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /recommendToMany/[userID1](/...)(?howMany=n)(&offset=o)(&considerKnownItems=true|false)(&rescorerParams=...) and in turn calls OryxRecommender.recommendToMany(String[], int, boolean, Rescorer).
    RefreshServlet
    Responds to a POST request to /refresh, and in turn calls OryxRecommender.refresh().
    SimilarityServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /similarity/[itemID1](/[itemID2]/...)(?howMany=n)(&offset=o)(&rescorerParams=...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.mostSimilarItems(String[], int) with the supplied values.
    SimilarityToItemServlet
    Responds to a GET request to /similarityToItem/[toItemID]/itemID1(/[itemID2]/...), and in turn calls OryxRecommender.similarityToItem(String, String...) with the supplied values.
    test_002dals_jspx
